title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-2.6 - Admission requirements for children
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 151-2.6 - Admission requirements for children

State Regulations
(a) No child may participate in the
prekindergarten program unless: (1)
A report
of a medical examination of the child signed by a physician is submitted within
30 days of admission which states that the child is free from contagious or
communicable disease. (2)

The child
has been immunized to the extent appropriate to his/her age in accordance with
section
2164
of the

Public Health Law; or has been granted an exemption from such
immunization. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
151-2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
